name: Halo Hopper
description:
An angel child falls from its home in the sky, and finds itself on the forest floor. Help guide it back up through a network of branches and fungi, dodging venus flytraps and
managing your meagre health pool. 

 - Navigate with the arrow keys, and hold "up" to glide.
 - Avoid the maws of Venus Flytraps.
 - Inky Caps and Stormclouds will send you flying higher, but beware - each time you touch them, you lose health.
 - Catch Moths to regain precious health.
